languages.text:
Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} могут защитить персонажа в случае {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}. Показатель брони исчисляется в процентах, а отражение урона — в натуральных числах. После расчета урона из его значения вычитается сначала отражение урона, а затем процент показателя брони.
Параметры оружия, такие как {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, могут уменьшить значение брони и отражения. При этом пробитие не может опустить защиту ниже нуля.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}Armour{/g} Rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a hit. Armour Rating is calculated as a percentage, and Damage Deflection is presented in simple numbers. After calculating the damage, Damage Deflection is first subtracted from its value, and then the percentage of the Armour Rating.
Weapon stats such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Deflection Negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Armour Penetration{/g} can reduce the value of Armour and Deflection. At the same time, Penetration cannot lower defence below zero.

traits.locale_text:
Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона могут защитить персонажа в случае попадания. Показатель брони исчисляется в процентах, а отражение урона — в простых числах. После расчета урона из его значения вычитается сначала отражение урона, а затем процент показателя брони.
Параметры оружия, такие как {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, могут уменьшить значение брони и отражения. При этом пробитие не может опустить защиту ниже нуля.

Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона могут защитить персонажа в случае попадания. Показатель брони исчисляется в процентах, а отражение урона — в простых числах. После расчета урона из его значения вычитается сначала отражение урона, а затем процент показателя брони.
Параметры оружия, такие как {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, могут уменьшить значение брони и отражения. При этом пробитие не может опустить защиту ниже нуля.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.
languages.original_text:
Показатель {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} могут защитить персонажа в случае {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}. Показатель брони исчисляется в процентах, а отражение урона — в натуральных числах. После расчета урона из его значения вычитается сначала отражение урона, а затем процент показателя брони.
Параметры оружия, такие как {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, могут уменьшить значение брони и отражения. При этом пробитие не может опустить защиту ниже нуля.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a hit. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while damage deflection is represented using integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} können den Charakter im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g} schützen. Der Rüstungswert wird als Prozentsatz berechnet, während die SchadensAblenkung mit positiven ganzzahligen Werten dargestellt wird. Nach der Berechnung des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} wird zunächst die Ablenkung abgezogen und dann der Schaden anhand des Prozentwerts der Rüstung weiter reduziert.
Waffenparameter wie {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Ablenkungsnegierung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} können den Wert von Rüstung und Ablenkung verringern. Die Durchdringung kann die Verteidigung jedoch nie unter null senken.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} können den Charakter im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffers{/g} schützen. Der Rüstungswert wird als Prozentsatz berechnet, während die Schadensdeflektion mit positiven ganzzahligen Werten dargestellt wird. Nach der Berechnung des Schadens wird zunächst die Deflektion abgezogen und dann der Schaden anhand des Prozentwerts der Rüstung weiter reduziert.
Waffenparameter wie {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Deflektionsnegierung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} können den Wert von Rüstung und Deflektion verringern. Die Durchdringung kann die Verteidigung jedoch nie unter null senken.

languages.text:
L'indice d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} peuvent protéger le personnage en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}. L'indice d'armure est calculé en pourcentage, tandis que la déflexion des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} est représentée par des valeurs entières positives. Après le calcul des dégâts, la déflexion est soustraite des dégâts, puis les dégâts sont réduits en fonction du pourcentage de l'indice d'armure.
Les paramètres d'armement comme la {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} peuvent réduire la valeur de l'armure et de la déflexion. Cependant, la pénétration ne peut jamais réduire les défenses en dessous de zéro.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

traits.locale_text:
L'indice d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} peuvent protéger le personnage en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g}. L'indice d'armure est calculé en pourcentage, tandis que la déflexion des dégâts est représentée par des valeurs entières positives. Après le calcul des dégâts, la déflexion est soustraite des dégâts, puis les dégâts sont réduits en fonction de la valeur en pourcentage de l'indice d'armure.
Les paramètres d'armement tels que la {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} peuvent réduire la valeur de l'armure et de la déflexion. Cependant, la pénétration ne peut jamais réduire les défenses en dessous de zéro.

languages.text:
当角色被攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}等级与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}可以吸收角色承受的伤害。护甲等级以百分比计算，而{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}偏转用正整数表示。计算伤害时，首先减掉伤害偏转，之后根据护甲百分比进一步降低伤害。
武器的部分属性，如{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，可以降低护甲的防御能力。不过，穿透效果无法将防御属性减为负值。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

traits.locale_text:
当角色被攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}等级与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}可以吸收角色承受的伤害。护甲等级以百分比计算，而伤害偏转用正整数表示。计算伤害时，首先减掉伤害偏转，之后根据护甲百分比进一步降低伤害。
武器的部分属性，如{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，可以降低护甲的防御能力。不过，穿透效果无法将防御属性减为负值。

languages.text:
El valor de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} pueden proteger al personaje cuando recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g}. El valor de armadura se calcula como un porcentaje, mientras que el desvío de daño se representa con números enteros. Tras calcular el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, primero se resta el desvío y después se reduce el nuevo total según el porcentaje del valor de armadura.
Los parámetros de arma como {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} pueden reducir el valor de armadura y el desvío. Sin embargo, la penetración nunca puede reducir las defensas por debajo de cero.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

traits.locale_text:
El valor de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} pueden proteger al personaje cuando recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}. El valor de armadura se calcula como un porcentaje, mientras que el desvío de daño se representa con números enteros. Tras calcular el daño, primero se resta el desvío y después se reduce el nuevo total según el porcentaje del valor de armadura.
Los parámetros de arma como {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} pueden reducir el valor de armadura y el desvío. Sin embargo, la penetración nunca puede reducir las defensas por debajo de cero.

languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a hit. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while damage deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}レートと{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}を受けた際にキャラクターを保護する。アーマーレートはパーセンテージで計算し、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}ディフレクションは正の整数で表される。ダメージを算出した後、まずダメージディフレクションを差し引き、そこからさらにアーマーレートのパーセンテージに基づきダメージを減算する。
{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}のような武器パラメータはアーマーやディフレクションの値を減少させることができる。ただし、貫通では防御を0より下げることはできない。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}レートと{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}を受けた際にキャラクターを保護する。アーマーレートはパーセンテージで計算し、ダメージディフレクションは正の整数で表される。ダメージを算出した後、まずダメージディフレクションを差し引き、そこからさらにアーマーレートのパーセンテージに基づきダメージを減算する。
{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}のような武器パラメータはアーマーやディフレクションの値を減少させることができる。ただし、貫通では防御を0より下げることはできない。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Zırh{/g} derecesi ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşa{/g} maruz kalması hâlinde karakteri koruyabilir. Zırh derecesi yüzde olarak hesaplanırken, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} saptırma ise pozitif tam sayı değerleri kullanılarak gösterilir. Hasar hesaplandıktan sonra, önce hasar saptırması çıkarılır ve ardından hasar, zırh derecesinin yüzde değerine bağlı olarak daha da azaltılır.
{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Saptırma yadsıması{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} gibi silah parametreleri, zırh ve saptırma değerlerini düşürebilir. Ancak delme değeri, savunmayı hiçbir zaman sıfırın altına indiremez.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} rating and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} can protect the character in the event of a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Armour rating is calculated as a percentage, while {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deflection is represented using positive integer values. After calculating the damage, damage deflection is first subtracted, and then the damage is further reduced based on the percentage value of the armour rating.
Weapon parameters such as {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} can reduce the value of armour and deflection. However, penetration can never lower defences below zero.
